title: Bug 49299 - Incorrect behavior described in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 regarding custom cookie name and URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299: The description mentions that Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 states that a custom cookie name affects URL rewriting.
OB: The current behavior is not mentioned in the bug report.
EB: Expectation: According to the mentioned phrase in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1, the Reload link should be 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F'.
SR: Steps to reproduce: Follow the steps mentioned in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 related to custom cookie name and URL rewriting and observe the behavior.
